interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Horror Double Feature (Hellraiser / Hellbound: Hellraiser 2)
Review Date: 2019/06/26
Store: Andrew Robinson  (Actor),     Ashley Laurence  (Actor),     Clive Barker  (Director),     Tony Randel  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    R    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Horror
Product Description: ['Prepare to go to hell and back again in this double feature installment of one of the most iconic horror franchises of all time from horror master Clive Barker! See how it all began in the classic original HELLRAISER where Pinhead is introduced to the world, and the equally brilliant HELLBOUND sequel that proves there are no limits! HELLRAISER (1987, 94 Mins.): From horror master Clive Barker comes this chilling nightmare featuring the first appearance of the hideous, demonic Pinhead. When Kirsty Cotton’s family moves into their ancestral home, they are terrorized by the resurrected corpse of her uncle, who requires the flesh of murdered innocent victims in order to become whole and alive again. A creepy, thrillingly perverse tale straddling heaven and hell, extreme pleasure and unbearable pain, HELLRAISER will haunt your dreams. HELLBOUND: HELLRAISER 2 (1988, 99 Mins.): In 1988, it emerged as the shocking follow-up to the film that redefined the face of horror. Two decades later, it remains the most brutally original sequel in horror film history. Clare Higgins, Ashley Laurence and Kenneth Cranham co-star in this hit sequel from executive producer Clive Barker that experiences the flesh like no other. The time to play has come again: Surrender yourself to the infernal labyrinth of HELLBOUND: HELLRAISER II.']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '25507355', 'Director': 'Clive Barker, Tony Randel', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, Color, Widescreen, Multiple Formats, NTSC', 'Run time': '3 hours and 13 minutes', 'Release date': 'September 4, 2012', 'Actors': 'Andrew Robinson, Ashley Laurence, Clare Higgins, Sean Chapman', 'Studio': 'Image Entertainment', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '1'}

['Prepare to go to hell and back again in this double feature installment of one of the most iconic horror franchises of all time from horror master Clive Barker! See how it all began in the classic original HELLRAISER where Pinhead is introduced to the world, and the equally brilliant HELLBOUND sequel that proves there are no limits! HELLRAISER (1987, 94 Mins.): From horror master Clive Barker comes this chilling nightmare featuring the first appearance of the hideous, demonic Pinhead. When Kirsty Cotton’s family moves into their ancestral home, they are terrorized by the resurrected corpse of her uncle, who requires the flesh of murdered innocent victims in order to become whole and alive again. A creepy, thrillingly perverse tale straddling heaven and hell, extreme pleasure and unbearable pain, HELLRAISER will haunt your dreams. HELLBOUND: HELLRAISER 2 (1988, 99 Mins.): In 1988, it emerged as the shocking follow-up to the film that redefined the face of horror. Two decades later, it remains the most brutally original sequel in horror film history. Clare Higgins, Ashley Laurence and Kenneth Cranham co-star in this hit sequel from executive producer Clive Barker that experiences the flesh like no other. The time to play has come again: Surrender yourself to the infernal labyrinth of HELLBOUND: HELLRAISER II.']

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

**Media Preferences:**
- Enjoys action and adventure genres, particularly in film, but has demonstrated a growing interest in horror, particularly films with strong narratives and high emotional stakes.
- Values high-quality storytelling, which is evident in a preference for well-rated productions across a broader range of genres, including horror.
- Appreciates films featuring strong character arcs and compelling narratives, reflecting a keen interest in how characters navigate moral and emotional challenges.

**Interaction Patterns:**
- Prefers movies with notable actors and directors, signaling a respect for established talent and a willingness to explore diverse genres, including horror, when well-regarded.
- Rates products highly, consistently giving top ratings to films that resonate with him, reaffirming his discerning taste in cinema across various genres.
- Engages with content that combines emotional depth with genre-specific elements, illustrating a desire for significant experiences, whether in action or horror.

**Overall Trends:**
- Likely enjoys a mix of mainstream, critically acclaimed films, and iconic horror franchises that showcase themes of struggle, adventure, and moral dilemmas.
- Demonstrates a thoughtful approach to media selection, often influenced by favorable recommendations and personal experiences, as reflected in his recent interest in horror.
- Recent interactions suggest an expanding appreciation for impactful cinematic experiences that balance adventure with emotional resonance, now including the horror genre.
